animeTitle: Global Horror: I Opened a Plug-in Selection Mall
otherNames: Global Horror: I opened a plug-in selection mall , 全球惊悚：我开启外挂自选商城, Global Thriller: I Opened a Cheat Customization Store
synopsis: The strange domain has descended all over the world. Terror and horror have become people's daily life. The master of strange has become the last hope of mankind. In order to completely eliminate the strange, it is necessary to thoroughly conquer the main world of strange. Countless masters of strange have fought one after another, and only one in ten humans has survived! Chu Sheng opened the plug-in selection mall. Every time he entered a strange domain, he could choose a plug-in. While other masters of strange were struggling to survive, powerful stranges crawled at his feet. This is a man who regards the strange domain as his home!
